function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to foreign supply shocks for smaller economies","Impact":"Disruption to production and supply chains, economic downturn","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers, development of domestic industries, stockpiling of critical goods","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, advanced forecasting and inventory management software","People":"Manufacturers, businesses, and workers in smaller economies","Owner":"Government, trade associations, and industry leaders"},{"Description":"Systemic implications of central countries and industries in the global production network","Impact":"Transmission of shocks throughout the global supply chain, economic instability","Mitigation":"Diversification of production networks, strengthening of domestic industries, international collaboration on risk management","Technologies":"Network analysis tools, supply chain optimization software, trade data analysis platforms","People":"Government policymakers, industry leaders, and trade organizations","Owner":"International organizations, industry associations, and global trade networks"},{"Description":"Increased centrality of China in global production networks","Impact":"Dependency on China for production and supply, vulnerability to Chinese market dynamics","Mitigation":"Diversification of sourcing, enhancement of domestic manufacturing capabilities, development of alternative trading partnerships","Technologies":"Global trade analytics platforms, supply chain mapping tools, predictive supply chain modeling software","People":"Global manufacturers, exporters, and supply chain managers","Owner":"International trade organizations, domestic industry leaders, and global trade networks"}]}
